verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came again unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> and say <WH559>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Howl <WH3213> you <WH1929>, Woe is the day <WH3117>!
For the day <WH3117> is near <WH7138>, even the day <WH3117> of the Lord <WH3068> is near <WH7138>, a cloudy <WH6051> day <WH3117>; it shall be the time <WH6256> of the heathen <WH1471>.

And the sword <WH2719> shall come <WH935> upon Egypt <WH4714>, and great pain <WH2479> shall be in Ethiopia <WH3568>, when the slain <WH2491> shall fall <WH5307> in Egypt <WH4714>, and they shall take away <WH3947> her multitude <WH1995>, and her foundations <WH3247> shall be broken down <WH2040>.

Ethiopia <WH3568>, and Libya <WH6316>, and Lydia <WH3865>, and all the mingled <WH6153> people <WH3552>, and Chub, and the men <WH1121> of the land <WH776> that is in covenant <WH1285>, shall fall <WH5307> with them by the sword <WH2719>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>; They also that uphold <WH5564> Egypt <WH4714> shall fall <WH5307>; and the pride <WH1347> of her power <WH5797> shall come down <WH3381>: from the tower <WH4024> of Syene <WH5482> shall they fall <WH5307> in it by the sword <WH2719>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.

And they shall be desolate <WH8074> in the midst <WH8432> of the countries <WH776> that are desolate <WH8074>, and her cities <WH5892> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of the cities <WH5892> that are wasted <WH2717>.
And they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>, when I have set <WH5414> a fire <WH784> in Egypt <WH4714>, and when all her helpers <WH5826> shall be destroyed <WH7665>.

In that day <WH3117> shall messengers <WH4397> go forth <WH3318> from me <WH6440> in ships <WH6716> to make the careless <WH983> Ethiopians <WH3568> afraid <WH2729>, and great pain <WH2479> shall come upon them <WH3117>, as in the day of Egypt <WH4714>: for <WH935>, behold, it comes.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; I will also make the multitude <WH1995> of Egypt <WH4714> to cease <WH7673> by the hand <WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>.

He and his people <WH5971> with him <WH6184>, the terrible of the nations <WH1471>, shall be brought <WH935> to destroy <WH7843> the land <WH776>: and they shall draw <WH7324> their swords <WH2719> against Egypt <WH4714>, and fill <WH4390> the land <WH776> with the slain <WH2491>.

And I will make <WH5414> the rivers <WH2975> dry <WH2724>, and sell <WH4376> the land <WH776> into the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7451>: and I will make the land <WH776> waste <WH8074>, and all that is in it <WH4393>, by the hand <WH3027> of strangers <WH2114>: I the Lord <WH3068> have spoken it <WH1696>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; I will also destroy <WH6> the idols <WH1544>, and I will cause their images <WH457> to cease <WH7673> out of Noph <WH5297>; and there shall be no more a prince <WH5387> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: and I will put <WH5414> a fear <WH3374> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And I will make Pathros <WH6624> desolate <WH8074>, and will set <WH5414> fire <WH784> in Zoan <WH6814>, and will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> in No <WH4996>.
And I will pour <WH8210> my fury <WH2534> upon Sin <WH5512>, the strength <WH4581> of Egypt <WH4714>; and I will cut off <WH3772> the multitude <WH1995> of No <WH4996>.

And I will set <WH5414> fire <WH784> in Egypt <WH4714>: Sin <WH5512> shall have great <WH2342> pain <WH2342>, and No <WH4996> shall be tore asunder <WH1234>, and Noph <WH5297> shall have distresses <WH6862> daily <WH3119>.
The young men <WH970> of Aven <WH206> and of Pi <WH6364>â€“beseth shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>: and these cities shall go <WH3212> into captivity <WH7628>.

At Tehaphnehes <WH8471> also the day <WH3117> shall be darkened <WH2821>, when I shall break <WH7665> there the yokes <WH4133> of Egypt <WH4714>: and the pomp <WH1347> of her strength <WH5797> shall cease <WH7673> in her <WH1931>: as for her <WH6051>, a cloud shall cover <WH3680> her <WH1323>, and her daughters shall go <WH3212> into captivity <WH7628>.
Thus will I execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> in Egypt <WH4714>: and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.

And it came to pass in the eleventh <WH259> year <WH8141>, in the first <WH7223> month <WH7651>, in the seventh day of the month <WH2320>, that the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, I have broken <WH7665> the arm <WH2220> of Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>; and <WH2280>, behold, it shall not be bound up to be healed <WH7499>, to put <WH7760> a bandage <WH2848> to bind <WH2280> it <WH2388>, to make it strong to hold <WH8610> the sword <WH2719>.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Behold <WH6547>, I am against Pharaoh king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and will break <WH7665> his arms <WH2220>, the strong <WH2389>, and that which was broken <WH7665>; and I will cause the sword <WH2719> to fall <WH5307> out of his hand <WH3027>.
And I will scatter <WH6327> the Egyptians <WH4714> among the nations <WH1471>, and will disperse <WH2219> them through the countries <WH776>.

And I will strengthen <WH2388> the arms <WH2220> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and put <WH5414> my sword <WH2719> in his hand <WH3027>: but I will break <WH7665> Pharaoh <WH6547>'s arms <WH2220>, and he shall groan <WH5008> before <WH6440> him with the groanings <WH5009> of a deadly wounded man <WH2491>.

But I will strengthen <WH2388> the arms <WH2220> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and the arms <WH2220> of Pharaoh <WH6547> shall fall down <WH5307>; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>, when I shall put <WH5414> my sword <WH2719> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall stretch it out <WH5186> upon the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And I will scatter <WH6327> the Egyptians <WH4714> among the nations <WH1471>, and disperse <WH2219> them among the countries <WH776>; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.
